titles.title: A resolution making minority party appointments for the 113th Congress.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
Senate Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship

bill.summary: 6/20/2013--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates the minority party membership on specified Senate committees for the 113th Congress.
